item.title: Vue项目学习
item.description: Vue学习笔记 一、二维数组尝试 var vm = new Vue({ el: "#app", data: { huilv:[ [6.8540, 132.9787, 1298.7013, 1.3278], [6.8540, 132.9787, 1298.7013, 1.3278] ],} 二、watch监听实现 watch: { first: function(newValue) { this.second = newValue * this.huilv[Number(this.firstbutton - 1)][Number(this.secondbutton -1)]; }, second: function(newValue) { this.first = newValue / this.huilv[Number(this.firstbutton - 1)][Number(this.secondbutton -1)];
